name: Scholars International Conference on PHYSICS AND QUANTUM PHYSICS
content: After a Great Success of First Edition Physics Conference 2022 held during June 22-23, 2022 at Berlin, Scholars Conferences proudly announcing its “2nd Edition Scholars International Conference on Physics and Quantum Physics” on March 27-28, 2023 in London, UK with the theme of “Recent Research Methodologies and Discoveries at Physics and Quantum Physics”.
